verses.text: \w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H7379"\w* dry \w morsel|strong="H6595"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* joy, \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w a|strong="H7379"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* victims \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*.

\w A|strong="H0251"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* foolish \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w tried|strong="H0974"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w furnace|strong="H3564"\w*: so \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* trieth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3826"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w evil|strong="H0205"\w* man obeyeth \w an|strong="H5921"\w* \w unjust|strong="H0205"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*: \w and|strong="H7181"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H8267"\w* hearkeneth \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* despiseth \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*, reproacheth \w his|strong="H3808"\w* Maker; \w and|strong="H8056"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* rejoiceth \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* man’s ruin, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*.

\w Children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Eloquent \w words|strong="H8193"\w* \w do|strong="H0637"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* become \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w fool|strong="H5036"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w prince|strong="H5081"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* expectation \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* expecteth, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* most acceptable jewel: whithersoever \w he|strong="H0834"\w* turneth \w himself|strong="H6437"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* understandeth wisely.

He \w that|strong="H1697"\w* concealeth \w a|strong="H1245"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*. seeketh friendships: he \w that|strong="H1697"\w* repeateth \w it|strong="H3680"\w* \w again|strong="H8138"\w*, separateth \w friends|strong="H6504"\w*.

\w A|strong="H5221"\w* reproof availeth more \w with|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* wise \w man|strong="H3684"\w*, than \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* stripes \w with|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*.

\w An|strong="H7971"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w man|strong="H0394"\w* always seeketh quarrels: \w but|strong="H0389"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w cruel|strong="H0394"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w shall|strong="H4397"\w* \w be|strong="H0389"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* against \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

It \w is|strong="H0376"\w* better \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w meet|strong="H6298"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* \w robbed|strong="H6298"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H0376"\w* whelps, \w than|strong="H0408"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* trusting \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* rendereth \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w quarrels|strong="H1566"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H4325"\w* when one letteth \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* suffereth reproach \w he|strong="H6440"\w* forsaketh judgment.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* justifieth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* condemneth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w abominable|strong="H8441"\w* before \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* doth \w it|strong="H4100"\w* avail \w a|strong="H2088"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* riches, seeing \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w cannot|strong="H0369"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*? \w He|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* maketh \w his|strong="H3027"\w* house high, seeketh \w a|strong="H2088"\w* downfall: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* refuseth \w to|strong="H0369"\w* learn, \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* fall \w into|strong="H3027"\w* evils.

\w He|strong="H6256"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* loveth \w at|strong="H0251"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*: \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* proved \w in|strong="H0251"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*.

\w A|strong="H8628"\w* foolish \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w will|strong="H0120"\w* \w clap|strong="H8628"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, \w when|strong="H8628"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w surety|strong="H6148"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0157"\w* that studieth discords, loveth quarrels: \w and|strong="H0157"\w* \w he|strong="H0157"\w* that exalteth \w his|strong="H1245"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, seeketh \w ruin|strong="H7667"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w* \w perverse|strong="H6141"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* perverteth \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3205"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* \w is|strong="H0001"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* own disgrace: \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H0001"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*.

\w A|strong="H7307"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8056"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* maketh age flourishing: \w a|strong="H7307"\w* sorrowful \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* drieth \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w the|strong="H3190"\w* \w bones|strong="H1634"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* taketh \w gifts|strong="H7810"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H0734"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, that \w he|strong="H5186"\w* may \w pervert|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H0734"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* shineth \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wise|strong="H2451"\w*: \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3205"\w* \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* anger \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* sorrow \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* mother \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* thing \w to|strong="H5921"\w* do hurt \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prince|strong="H5081"\w*, \w who|strong="H6662"\w* judgeth \w right|strong="H6662"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* setteth bounds \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*. \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* wise: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* precious \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w Even|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* \w fool|strong="H0191"\w*, if \w he|strong="H2803"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* hold \w his|strong="H0995"\w* peace \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*: \w and|strong="H0995"\w* if \w he|strong="H2803"\w* \w close|strong="H0995"\w* \w his|strong="H0995"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \w a|strong="H1571"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*.
